lead_paragraph: KATZMAN--Joan, a resident of Larchmont, passed away on February 18, 2016. Beloved wife of Seymour. Loving mother of Marlene Petrucelli. Adoring grandmother of Jack. Dear sister of Paul Friedberg. Funeral Service Sunday, 12 noon at the John J. Fox Funeral Home, Inc. in Larchmont. Interment is private. 1/3
